apprenticeships.title: UK Software Engineering Apprenticeship
apprenticeships.description: The Software Engineering Apprenticeship is a full time, 24 month, paid role which includes an initial technical ‘Bootcamp’ for 5 months which takes place remotely and is delivered through an external training provider.
apprenticeships.duration: 24 month, which includes an initial technical ‘Bootcamp’ for 5 months which is delivered through an external training provider.
apprenticeships.apply_by: Invited at session on April once recruitment for 2023 begins
apprenticeships.for more details: Please leave your expression of intrest at: uk_apprenticeships@group.apple.com

apprenticeships.title: Data Analytics Apprenticeship, July 2023
apprenticeships.description: The Google Data Analytics Apprenticeship is a 24-month in-person program for early career graduates interested in Data Analytics. Apprentices work with a Google team, relocate if needed, and attend classroom learning. No immigration sponsorship.
apprenticeships.location: Hyderabad, Telangana, India; Bangalore, Karnataka, India; Mumbai, Maharashtra, India; Gurgaon, Haryana, India.
apprenticeships.minimum qualifications: Candidates must have a bachelor's degree or equivalent experience, with no more than 1 year of relevant experience in data analytics. They should be fluent in English, have experience with Google Workspace or similar applications.
apprenticeships.start_date: Apprentices are expected to join in person at their assigned in-office

apprenticeships.title: Digital Marketing Apprenticeship, July 2023 Start
apprenticeships.description: The Google Digital Marketing Apprenticeship is a 24-month in-person program for early career graduates interested in Digital Marketing. Apprentices work with a Google team, relocate if needed, and attend classroom learning. No immigration sponsorship.
apprenticeships.location: Hyderabad, Telangana, India; Mumbai, Maharashtra, India; Gurgaon, Haryana, India; Bangalore, Karnataka, India.
apprenticeships.minimum qualifications: Candidates need a bachelor's degree or equivalent experience, with up to 1 year of experience in Digital Marketing. They should have experience with Google Workspace or similar apps and be fluent in English.

apprenticeships.title: Project Management Apprenticeship, July 2023 Start
apprenticeships.description: The Google Project Management Apprenticeship is a 24-month in-person program for early career graduates interested in Project Management. Apprentices work with a Google team, relocate if needed, and attend classroom learning. No immigration sponsorship.
apprenticeships.location: Hyderabad, Telangana, India; Gurgaon, Haryana, India; Bangalore, Karnataka, India; Mumbai, Maharashtra, India.
apprenticeships.minimum qualifications: Candidates need a bachelor's degree or equivalent experience, with up to 1 year of experience in Project Management. They should have experience with Google Workspace or similar apps and be fluent in English.

apprenticeships.title: Student Education Service Officer
apprenticeships.description: This role will be based on the University campus, with scope for it to be undertaken in a hybrid manner. We are also open to discussing flexible working arrangements.

apprenticeships.title: Student Support Administrator Apprenticeship
apprenticeships.description: Suffolk Academies Trust seeks a Student Support Administrator at Abbeygate Sixth Form College, Bury St Edmunds, alongside One Sixth Form College.

apprenticeships.title: Student Finance Officer Apprenticeship
apprenticeships.description: Assist with Student Finance applications, scheduling meetings, updating records, responding to inquiries, and providing customer care.

apprenticeships.title: Teaching Assistant Apprenticeship
apprenticeships.description: The Florence Nightingale Academy is hiring a teaching assistant to support primary school children's learning in groups or individually.
